content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Protect your employees, patients, and yourself with genuine, FDA & NIOSH certified N95 masks. These masks are recommended over single layer surgical masks due to their superior filtration of small particles and airborne viruses.

  • FDA, CE, and NIOSH approved for 95% efficiency
  • Individually adjustable aluminum nose clip for fit
  • Exceptional internal filter for low breathing resistance
  • Ultrasonic welded head straps for secure seal
  • High density urethane foam nose piece
  • 85% polypropylene, 15% polyester

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”73859,73861″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1592497804998{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

N95 Mask

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]While single layer nuisance dust masks can help keep you safe during light construction or cleaning activities, they offer little protection against very small particles traveling through the air, like germs from a cough or sneeze, or fine non-poisonous dusts. For protection against small particles, a mask with filtration material, a particulate respirator is often required. The most popular of particulate respirators approved by the National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health (NIOSH) is the N95 mask, labeled N95 for their 95% efficiency rating. The N95 masks can filter particles of 0.3 microns.

NIOSH and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommended N95 masks for protection of healthcare workers who come in direct contact with patients with Coronavirus and other airborne viruses.

TTI Medical’s N95 Respirator masks conform to NIOSH standards. Our Disposable N95 mask provides protection against solids such as minerals, coal, iron ore, flour and certain other substances. They are extremely durable, have a soft and comfortable inner surface, an adjustable nose piece and secure head straps to provide proper fit.

Part # 203-003[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3dc035-e168″][vc_column_text]Our N95 mask is FDA, CE, and NIOSH approved.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
